column4: serves as the main and most majestic entrance to Khiva’s ancient inner city — a UNESCO World Heritage Site. This imposing gate was historically the official ceremonial entry point to the city and continues to welcome visitors into one of Central Asia’s best-preserved medieval urban ensembles.
